title: Combat Achievements/All tasks
content:
Contents

  • 1 Easy
  • 2 Medium
  • 3 Hard
  • 4 Elite
  • 5 Master
  • 6 Grandmaster

Easy[edit | edit source]

Main article: Combat Achievements/Easy
Monster Name Description Category

Obor Sleeping Giant Kill Obor whilst he is immobilized. Mechanical

Sarachnis Sarachnis Novice Kill Sarachnis 10 times. Kill count

Wintertodt Handyman Repair a brazier which has been destroyed by the Wintertodt. Mechanical
Wintertodt Mummy! Heal a pyromancer after they have fallen. Mechanical
